item.description:
Jonas Green - A local Salem Resident, will be interviewed by Evengelical Pastor Phil Wyman.

Jonas and Phil will talk about how I as an atheist deal with the stresses, and challenges that we all face in life. From simply finding morality without god, to personal crisis, and how we as a community of people come together in times of national tradgedy.

Phil Wyman is a local Evangelical Paster, who has reached out to Wiccans, Pagans and others in the local Salem community - And a long time friend of Jonas. Phil's church 'The Gathering at Salem' holds the motto 'Short on Rules, Long on Relationships.'
item.name: Nationwide 'Ask an Atheist Day' Local Event -
